revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=Meraki MR12 |revision= |upc=810979010951 |ean= |asin=B004KZI1WA |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/22/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=UDX-60013010 |ic_id=6961A-60013010 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16DS-5T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283;AR9283-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8021;AR8021-BL1E; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os=Linux;2.6.16.16; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=10.128.128.128 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:18:0A |oui_eth=00:18:0A }} "7016A0445001 Ver: 1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device has one Gigabit Ethernet port (uplink) and one 10/100 port.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/meraki/mr12 On '''OpenWRT''' Wiki] :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR7242 @400MHz :Wireless: [[Atheros]] AR9283-AL1A 2T2R 802.11bgn :Ethernet ports: [[Atheros]] AR8021-BL1E 1x GbE
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=165206 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :(w/ boot log and links to internal photos) :Presumed 00:18:0A OUI..
Default settings are per the FCC manual.
